snippet: Just over 50 percent of students are eligible for free or reduced-price lunches, the Southern Education Foundation said.
abstract: Analysis by Southern Education Foundation finds that just over half of all students attending public schools in United States are eligible for free or reduced-price lunches; data proves that public schools are educating higher number of low-income children.
lead_paragraph: Just over 50 percent of students are eligible for free or reduced-price lunches, the Southern Education Foundation said.

headline.main: Percentage of Poor Students in Public Schools Rises
headline.print_headline: Percentage of Poor Students in Public Schools Rises
